presets.name: Excited Announcer
presets.text: [sound of an explosion] This summer, in a world where heroes are forged... get ready for an adventure like no other. One hero will rise.

presets.name: Documentary Narrator
presets.text: Here, in the vast expanse of the Serengeti, the cycle of life plays out. [pause] Every day is a struggle for survival, a delicate dance between predator and prey.
presets.prompt: You are a documentary narrator. Speak in a calm, clear, and thoughtful voice.

presets.name: Urgent News Bulletin
presets.text: [sound of a news alert] We interrupt this program with a breaking news story. We're getting reports... [pause] yes, we can now confirm there is a large traffic jam on the interstate. Avoid the area if possible.
presets.prompt: You are a news anchor delivering an urgent breaking news report. Speak clearly and with a sense of urgency.

presets.name: Gentle Storyteller
presets.text: [sound of a gentle harp strum] Once upon a time, in a cozy cottage deep in the woods, there lived a very brave little mouse. His name was Timothy, and he was about to have a very big adventure.
presets.prompt: You are telling a bedtime story to a child. Speak in a soft, gentle, and slightly magical voice.

presets.name: Sarcastic Teenager
presets.text: [sigh] Oh, great. Another family dinner. I can hardly contain my excitement. [muttering] I wonder what thrilling stories I'll get to hear this time.
presets.prompt: You are a sarcastic teenager who is unenthusiastic about a family event. Say the following with a dry, slightly bored tone.
